text: The Mall Walthamstow is a shopping centre in Walthamstow, London, owned by Capital & Regional. It was formerly known as Selborne Walk Shopping Centre. ==History== The centre was opened as Selborne Walk in 1988. It was acquired by Capital & Regional in 1997, and rebranded as part of The Mall Fund in 2011–2012. The Mall was internally refurbished in 2015 and in 2018 plans went ahead to extend the centre by , including other regenerations in its vicinity.https://www.egi.co.uk/news/cr-gets-green-light-for-walthamstow-mall- development-plans/ On the morning of 22 July 2019, a large fire broke out at the centre, considered a "major incident" by the police and tackled by firefighters for up to seven hours. The fire caused extensive damage and destroyed more than half of the building's roof. The damage caused the centre to be closed for several weeks, reopening on 4 September. ==Stores== Stores at The Mall Walthamstow include Clarks, Asda, Boots, TK Maxx across one floor, along with restaurants on the first floor. ==References== Category:Shopping centres in the London Borough of Waltham Forest Category:Shopping malls established in 1988
